revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR843ND |revision=v1.x |series=N300 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/21/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=wireless router,client |fcc_id=TE7WR843ND |ic_id=8853A-WR843ND |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.85 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9341 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL032PIF |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9425G6JH-5 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9341 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TP-LINK_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|300Mbps Wireless AP/Client Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/ca/products/details/?model=TL-WR843ND Product page] {{â€¢}} [http://www.tp-link.com/Resources/document/TL-WR843ND_V1_User_Guide.pdf User Guide]
"2050500252" and "Rev:1.1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The Flash appears to be a '''Spansion''' FL032PIF in the FCC photos. Per the manual provided by '''TP-LINK''', the default SSID pattern is '''TP-LINK_XXXXXX'''.
==Images== <gallery caption="from TP-LINK"> Image:TL-WR843ND-01.jpg|front Image:TL-WR843ND-02.jpg|back </gallery>[[Has images::external| ]]
